title: Previews Posted
content: Greater Albion have just posted some preview images featuring two iminent releases -Slatterine and Stannard- [here on our blog](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016194540/http:/gatf.wordpress.com/). Slatterine is a retro themed face wikth overtones of the 1950s era of chromium and streamlining. Stannard owes its inspiration to 1920s advertising designs.
author: Rasendyll
